Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception™ Grenade (Female)
kDesc
Seems like you're something of an explosives expert. Here, hold on to this. . . No, don't pull the pin! [#Legal]
Vous avez tout l'air d'une experte en explosifs. Tenez, prenez ça. . .Non, ne tirez pas sur la goupille ! [#Legal]
Du scheinst eine Sprengstoffexpertin zu sein. Hier, halte das . . . nein, nicht den Stift herausziehen! [#Legal]
A quanto pare sei una specie di esperta di esplosivi. Ecco, tieni questa... No, non togliere la sicura! [#Legal]
Parece que se te dan bien los explosivos. Ten, sujeta esto. . . no, ¡no tires de la anilla! [#Legal]
*Not Localised* Female01_Hands_Uncharted3_Grenade [#Legal]
폭발문 전문가시군요. 이걸 잠깐만 들고 계세요. . . 아니, 핀은 뽑지 말고! [#Legal]
Seems like you're something of an explosives expert. Here, hold on to this. . . No, don't pull the pin! [#Legal]
看來你是個炸藥專家。來，拿著這個. . .不，不要拉保險栓！ [#Legal]
看來你是個炸藥專家。來，拿著這個. . .不，不要拉保險栓！ [#Legal]
